rationale: No intensifier or comparative directly modifies a risk-adjective.
The segment reports action ('will be culled') and low risk ('will not enter the food system') (Q4), but contains no Q2 cues.
The segment describes a future containment action ('will be culled') and provides a food safety assurance, which are Neutral/Q5 cues, not Q3.
The segment uses 'will not enter the food system', which is a bare negation, not an explicit calming cue.
No minimiser ('only', 'just', 'merely', 'a single', 'few') combined with an explicit scale contrast.
